data.title: Simtra BioPharma Solutions
data.text:
COMPREHENSIVE, CUSTOMIZED SERVICES

We offer a wide array of services and capabilities designed to meet the unique challenges of manufacturing injectables and tailored to your needs, from clinical production through commercial launch and beyond. These range from formulation and development, lyophilization optimization, analytical services and technology transfer capabilities, to sterile manufacturing fill/finish operations with the option of specialized containment, to global regulatory support.

THE RIGHT DELIVERY SYSTEM

Whether your product’s manufacturing requirements are standard or complex, we can provide the right delivery system – multi- or single-dose liquid, lyophilized or powder-filled vials, or single-dose prefilled syringes. As a specialist in injectables, we have long experience and deep scientific expertise across numerous drug categories, including cytotoxics, highly potent compounds, biologics, small molecules and diluents for reconstitution.

QUALITY-DRIVEN, cGMP-COMPLIANT FACILITIES

We conduct operations in cGMP-compliant facilities in both the United States and Germany, using ISO 14001-certified manufacturing practices and state-of-the-art equipment. Each facility offers specialized expertise and is staffed with quality experts to ensure compliance. The two facilities readily share knowledge and best practices as appropriate. The high-quality products we manufacture for our clients are distributed in more than 120 countries.

EXPERTISE, EXPERIENCE — AND COMMITMENT

We are here to help you maximize the potential of your molecule. You can rely on us for high product quality, exceptionally responsive service and on-time delivery. We know that the care and precision that define our work are vital to the patients you serve — so we are profoundly committed to what we do. We also uphold our responsibility to our communities, the environment, and our own employees.
